mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.createrid AS "createrid", a.content AS "content", a.date AS "date", a.evaluation AS "evaluation", a.score AS "score", a.advice AS "advice", a.pm_id AS "pmId", a.group_id AS "divgroup", sc.pm_id AS "managerid", sc.name AS "classname", sg.id AS "groupid", sg.name AS "groupname", su.id AS "sysid", su.name AS "managername"
LEFT JOIN sys_classes sc ON sc.pm_id=a.createrid AND a.date BETWEEN sc.openDate AND sc.closeDate LEFT JOIN sys_group sg ON sg.id=a.group_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=a.pm_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_discuss( id, createrid, content, date, evaluation, score, advice, pm_id, group_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createrid}, #{content}, #{date}, #{evaluation}, #{score}, #{advice}, #{pmId}, #{divgroup} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_discuss SET createrid = #{createrid}, content = #{content}, date = #{date}, evaluation = #{evaluation}, score = #{score}, advice = #{advice}, pm_id = #{pmId}, group_id = #{divgroup} WHERE id = #{id}
